channel.title: The Hairstyle I Want [EDITED]
channel.description:
EDITED!!!
I just recently got my head shaved (lol, spur of the moment...) and I now wanna let it grow back a little then try to get it to look like my bad ass hero sinister gates =D.
[b]SINISTER GATES IS THE LEAD GUITARIST TO AVENGED SEVENFOLD FYI[/b]
[img]http://images2.fanpop.com/images/photos/5700000/SYNYSTER-GATES-IS-ATTRACTIVE-synyster-gates-5700103-691-689.jpg[/img]

item.title: The Hairstyle I Want [EDITED]
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

My hair had varied between long and short. Freshmen I thought long would be decent. It got me the ladies cause I had “soft hair”. Then I cut my hair and grew it semi-long and they said I looked emo but somewhat “hot”. Then I got it cut short and now I’m a pimp.

Depends on the area I guess?

Read full topic

item.title: The Hairstyle I Want [EDITED]
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:22, topic:355967”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=452508.msg3318343#msg3318343 date=1282496363]
Crew cut is for douchebags and southern rednecks, or it is down here at least.
[/quote]I live in Jersey and gay emo swoops are generally frowned upon. Short hair is always welcomed.

Besides, I can’t let my hair get long since its the ungodly curly kind that doesn’t become an afro <.<[/quote]

Yeh, in jersey I could understand why that is true. Longer hair is frowned upon where I live also.

Read full topic

item.title: The Hairstyle I Want [EDITED]
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“Cowarooroo, post:3, topic:355967”][quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=452508.msg3315779#msg3315779 date=1282304651]
Yeah I wanna do something like that with my hair, but my hair is like… to softt even with gel it’s still hard. (king like a while back Silent-CJ said )
[/quote]
Mines a little curley when it gets long so it’s gonna be a challenge. But if I get it to work the most awkward part is the conversation I’m gonna have to have with my dad… “Hey dad can you buy me a straightener and some hairspray so I can do my hair every morning before school?”… His response will probably be along the lines of, “Sure, want me to pick you up some tampons and mascara while I’m at it?”… Lol jk my dad’s not like that, but it’ll still be awkward.[/quote]lols, but hair straightener’s aren’t cheap :P, well… depends on quality.

Read full topic
